metadata.title: CVE-2014-6070 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Adiscon LogAnalyzerbefore 3.6.6 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the hostname in (1) index.php or (2) detail.php.

criterions.comment: loganalyzer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
